ygData.subject: Great update!
ygData.msgSnippet: So I just got EQ a week ago and i am completly addicted. So Monday night I was going through some serious EQ joneses but got through by thinking about how I
ygData.messageBody:
So I just got EQ a week ago and i am completly
addicted. So Monday night I was going through some serious
EQ joneses but got through by thinking about how I
will be able to play on Tuesday and things will be
better then before...WRONG!<br><br>First it took me an
hour to patch and get on last night (That's with a DSL
connection!) then once I get in there, every time I click on
any menu my screen shakes like crazy, making it
almost imposible to read. Then when I click on done to
go back to the combat menu...I loose the entire menu
around the view display! I am so mad! I just hope EQ
gets all the bugs worked out of it and soon! Otherwise
I am switching to dark ages of Camelot.<br><br>CJ
